I have made a sucessful hybrid vtol that is very good I have three so far all you need to do is turn on sas and turn on engines

you need the non vtol engine to make it go foward and not slam into the vab

note: you do need sas on and the first pic is the vtol 1 second is vtol 2 and third is vtol 3

with all you can decouple engines and on vtol 2 you can decouple the taking off gear but doing this means that to land you need to jettison the engines but you do not need to do this on vtol 1 and 3
For some reason, when you take SAS off, it veers horribly to the left and everyone dies soon after.
it is because that two or four engines are unstable when you do not have much control also I will post pictures soons
